subject: Valentine
text:
I Know I Don't Have
Love Like Other Couples

But I know Someone 
Is Waiting Just Like Me

I May Not Be The Best
But I Know The Sky Will Watch

The Sky Will Watch Me
And Say 'Keeping You Single For Someone Special' 

I May Not Be Pretty
but I've Got Talent For Something

Always Single, 
Looking For Someone Special Like You

when That Sweet Day Come
I Want To Say 'Be My Valentine'
